TntUnicodeControls (BCB)

Download

  • Download http://download.tntware.com/delphi_unicode_controls/TntUnicodeControls.zip

Project

  • Open %SOURCE_HOME%/BCB6/TntLibD.bpk

Install

  • Compile

Project

  • Open %SOURCE_HOME%/BCB6/TntLibR.bpk

Install

  • Install

Project

  • Open %SOURCE_HOME%/BCB6/TntThemeManager.bpk

Bug correction

  • Project options, Directories/Conditional:
    Intermediate output = ""

Adaptation

  • Project options, Directories/Conditional:
    Library path, add %SHARED%/Library/BCB
